data.text: @timdayipper @YoMan1192 @InfectiousDz Does HK have a breakdown of vaccinated deaths by vaccine type?

@FeiglDingLs @leftyvegan @TWustenhaus @MRDuLock @InfectiousDz Yes, New Zealand stalled the virus until such time eligible citizens vax rates hit 90%. Now there opening up and loosening restrictions Omicron will spread like wildfire however, hospitilization and death will be minimal compared to other countries.

@angrybklynmom @InfectiousDz 2/1 20+ y old won't get booster,  she had bad "flu' from second dose. None of my friends had bad reactions. But maybe the more frail Chinese react worse?  rumour mill is Very active here. So yes distrust of Gov is also a big factor.  Chile high trust high vax
@InfectiousDz At the end of the day, it comes down to leadership with a plan focusing on saving people. NZ covid stats would have been disastrous under a National Government.

@angrybklynmom @InfectiousDz The media in HK is still today reporting vaccine related ADR's which confuses people. I know lots of people who won't get a vax here even now, old and young. I'm wondering if frailty here increases reaction after vax - just speaking to a 20+ y old 1/1

@leftyvegan @InfectiousDz @evolutionarypsy China is talking of moving from Zero Covid..plus china has Sinovac & Sinopharm, sadly these vaccines are not showing good protection rates. So China will mimic the HK disaster if Omicron gets out there

@ElaineC48486251 @InfectiousDz I've said quarantine the elderly from the beginning said it to HKU. Got push back at first then HKU agreed & proposed it. Still not happening wasting resources quarantining asymptomatic & vaxed. HK is killing it's own here.

@TWustenhaus @InfectiousDz They take your full name and your temperature to go to a restaurant now and that is "reduced" policy. They relaxed visiting restrictions so now you can go there for medical treatment so I wouldn't say "pretty free"

@InfectiousDz Seriously?  The scale on the Y-axis.  I thought at first it said TWELVE.  It says one decimal point two (1.2). So 1.2 deaths per 100,000.  And you draw the chart like that?   Absurd.  So very few deaths overall. https://t.co/gQTpESzL4h

@InfectiousDz Give me a break. You really think NZ hasn't had any deaths since Feb 22? Not one? Of course not. Ardern is simply better able to delay reporting and keep her people in the dark. Better than the Chinese Communist Party, which says something about her fitness to lead a democracy. https://t.co/XMtTqDyrqp
